title: "The Boss" logo
content:
Hello folks. Is the word “Boss” a font, with a little bit of work, and if so, what is the font name?

Skip

comments.content:
Please email me, (on the name of the font for “Boss”) as we have a daughter getting married Saturday and I’ll likely forget to check the forums for awhile.

Skip

[vze2rwkt@verizon.net](mailto:vze2rwkt@verizon.net)
Don’t know if it’s a font, but is sure looked [familiar](http://web.archive.org/web/20051128213425/http:/www.rossstores.com/images/ross_logo.gif) to me.
